content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Threads

function pig_latinify(vec::Vector{String})
    pool = ThreadPool()
    results = []
    for v in vec
        push!(results, @async v->convert_to_pig_latin(v) end)
    end
    joinall(results)
end

function convert_to_pig_latin(s::String)
    vowels = ['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u']
    n = length(s)
    i = findfirst(v -> startswith(s, v), vowels)
    if isempty(i)
        s*"way"
    elseif i == 1
        s*"hay"
    else
        s[i:end]*s[1:(i-1)]*"ay"
    end
end
```
